Manifest.Name: Quasar Radiance
Manifest.Description: A version of Any Radiance 3.0 that's heavily modified to be more fun and enjoyable by casual players while still providing some level of challenge. Very unique fight that's not impossibly hard like the real thing. The mod is meant to be played with a 300 FPS cap so if you play on lower or higher it's gonna be harder or easier than intended.

Manifest.Name: ScreenShakeService
Manifest.Description: Removes screen shake: Screen Shake Service simply supports slashing Scooped Swordsman's (Hollow Knight's) superfluous screen shake since said shaking stimulates some souls' squeamishness.

Manifest.Name: Bonfire
Manifest.Description: A level-up system in Hollow Knight for a more realistic Dark Souls experience (a well-known Hollow Knight ripoff).

Manifest.Name: Lightbringer
Manifest.Description: Major gameplay overhaul: fight your way through Hallownest with a lance of light, brand new charms and radiant spells to seek the binding light that plagues our dreams.

Manifest.Name: Exaltation
Manifest.Description: Implements the scrapped mechanic of "charm glorification": empower your charms by progressing through Godhome.

Manifest.Name: Pale Shadow
Manifest.Description: Homemade Pure Vessel boss mod.

Manifest.Name: Floor is Lava
Manifest.Description: Is a floor is lava mod for Hollow Knight. PLease read Read.me

Manifest.Name: Omega Radiance
Manifest.Description: Face the god of power, a modified version of Any Radiance which was made not to be harder but to be a cool and unique fight.

Manifest.Name: Sunset Rad
Manifest.Description: Modded Radiance

Manifest.Name: Sunset Samsara II
Manifest.Description: Modded Radiance

Manifest.Name: Pure Shape
Manifest.Description: Changes the player's spell and nail arts, players can use skills similar to pure containers, such as blocking counterattacks.

Manifest.Name: Castless Focus
Manifest.Description: Stops the focus button from casting when tapped. (Note: This causes tapping the focus button to always start the focus, with the same delay as if it was held)

Manifest.Name: ModCommon
Manifest.Description:
A hollow knight mod that provides an API of helpers and other utilities for modding hollow knight.
Not recommended for use in new mods.

Manifest.Name: Flukemaster
Manifest.Description: All spells are affected by flukenest

Manifest.Name: EndlessIBaldur
Manifest.Description: A mod for practicing itemless baldur

Manifest.Name: Marmalade
Manifest.Description: Radiance spawns Marmu instead of orbs

Manifest.Name: Pogonest
Manifest.Description: Pogo anything

Manifest.Name: IntangibleShadow
Manifest.Description: Shade Cloak can go through just about anything

Manifest.Name: CustomPlayerModel
Manifest.Description: Replace your knight sprite with a 3D model

Manifest.Name: InfiniteMapMarkers
Manifest.Description: Why stop at 6 of each map marker

Manifest.Name: ShadesAnywhere
Manifest.Description: A shade can spawn in dreams, White Palace, and Godhome

Manifest.Name: BetterModList
Manifest.Description: Customize how the mod list is displayed

Manifest.Name: UnconstrainedRotation
Manifest.Description: The knight can rotate freely

Manifest.Name: FlappyKnight
Manifest.Description: It's Flappy Bird but in Hollow Knight

Manifest.Name: Taxes
Manifest.Description: All your geo means all your geo

Manifest.Name: Archiv
Manifest.Description: Something is amiss in Teacher's Archives

Manifest.Name: AlwaysWorldSense
Manifest.Description: Grants World Sense immediately

Manifest.Name: BingoGoalPack2
Manifest.Description: Adds more granular specifications for custom BingoSync challenges

Manifest.Name: KeybindOverhaul
Manifest.Description: Enhances keybind customization with split actions, key combos, and duplicate inputs

Manifest.Name: MidasTouch
Manifest.Description: Gorgeous Husk drops a charm that turns enemies to gold

Manifest.Name: HkmpTransitionAlerts
Manifest.Description: An HKMP addon to highlight recently used transitions

Manifest.Name: CycloneCopter
Manifest.Description: Extend your cyclone to achieve liftoff

Manifest.Name: PogoableFlukes
Manifest.Description: You can pogo off your flukenest casts

Manifest.Name: AdBlocker
Manifest.Description: Blocks ads

Manifest.Name: VoiceToCrySuffering
Manifest.Description: A minor tweak to the Pure Vessel fight

Manifest.Name: PlayerTrail
Manifest.Description: An HKMP addon to add a lingering trail behind some players

Manifest.Name: KeepDiveIFrames
Manifest.Description: Now you can abuse i-frames for dive spam again

Manifest.Name: UnlimitedHiveblood
Manifest.Description: Adds synergy between Hiveblood and Kingsoul/Voidheart for unlimited regen

Manifest.Name: MilliGolf
Manifest.Description: An 18-hole course featuring Millibelle the Golf Ball

Manifest.Name: NoTransitions
Manifest.Description: INCOMPLETE, BROKEN, DEMO VERSION. View ReadMe for more info

Manifest.Name: WorseSteadyBody
Manifest.Description: Steady Body now has a more consistent effect

Manifest.Name: DynamicCrystalDash
Manifest.Description: Scales the speed of cdash by how long you charge it

Manifest.Name: SaferWhitePalace
Manifest.Description: Allows you to remove the dangers of White Palace

Manifest.Name: Elderbugnest
Manifest.Description: Replaces a bunch of NPCs with the sweet old friend

Manifest.Name: BingoGoalPack1
Manifest.Description: Adds more goals to BingoSync and includes new board types

Manifest.Name: BingoSyncExtension
Manifest.Description: Previously used to add extra automarking logic to BingoSync, now deprecated

Manifest.Name: SiblingClimb
Manifest.Description: Removes platforms from the lighthouse climb.

Manifest.Name: UnlimitedShades
Manifest.Description: Multiple shades can coexist, so geo is never truly lost.

Manifest.Name: PersistentDivine
Manifest.Description: A mod that keeps Divines tent in Dirtmouth even after you banish the Grimm Troupe so you don't accidentally miss the chance to get unbreakable charms

Manifest.Name: DarkerTransitions
Manifest.Description: Turns bright screen transitions black.

Manifest.Name: Pale Court
Manifest.Description:
Challenge Hallownest's mightiest champions in grand combat!
Overcome your opponents with powerful new charms!
Discover new secrets and stories!
All with an incredible new soundtrack!

Manifest.Name: FiendMod
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight mod that replaces the word fool with fiend

Manifest.Name: Floor Time Counter
Manifest.Description: Adds a counter for how many frames you've touched the ground.

Manifest.Name: Snom
Manifest.Description: Cosmetic mod that replaces Tiktiks in the game with Snoms

Manifest.Name: Grub Names
Manifest.Description: ItemChanger/Randomizer 4 add-on that replaces Grub names with Skurry's Grub names

Manifest.Name: Hallownest-Vocalized
Manifest.Description: Adds English voice acting to all Hollow Knight's in-game dialogue.

Manifest.Name: Hallownest-Vocalized-AudioLoader
Manifest.Description: A dependency for Hallownest Vocalized. Download this with the main mod if you haven't!

Manifest.Name: Disable Low Health Vignette
Manifest.Description: Disables the low health vignette.

Manifest.Name: Remove Haunted Foes
Manifest.Description: This mod has been replaced by Better Godhome Music

Manifest.Name: Better Godhome Music
Manifest.Description: Replaces Haunted Foes with new Godhome versions of boss tracks (made by me)

Manifest.Name: STFUGrimmChild
Manifest.Description: makes grimm child stfu

Manifest.Name: Core.FsmUtil
Manifest.Description: A library mod for fsm editing.

Manifest.Name: Fyrenest
Manifest.Description: Adds 30 new charms and creates new things to explore! The full map recreation is now being rolled back. If you want to continue playing with the map changes, either don't update or get the latest version off the repository.

Manifest.Name: Mash Dash
Manifest.Description: Dash continually, faster, and without need for refresh

Manifest.Name: Mash Slash
Manifest.Description: Swing the nail as fast as you can mash the button

Manifest.Name: Charm Crab
Manifest.Description: New Charm Mechanics, New Charms, New Spells, and Rebalances

Manifest.Name: Nightmare Spark
Manifest.Description: Adds a Grimm Troupe themed charm with various charm synergies.

Manifest.Name: Breakable Wall Randomizer
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight Randomizer add-on for breakable walls.

Manifest.Name: Heal On Wall
Manifest.Description: Makes it so you can Heal On Walls

Manifest.Name: Better Void Heart
Manifest.Description: Keep Kingsoul soul regen when you pick up Void Heart.

Manifest.Name: RadianceExtras
Manifest.Description: Adds Extra Things to the Abs Rad Fight

Manifest.Name: Lost Artifacts
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds powerful artifacts scattered all across Hallownest that can be equipped to the nail! Compatible with Randomizer 4.

Manifest.Name: Dead Quirrel
Manifest.Description: He's dead. Stop being in denial. Now featuring support for whether or not he has a mask.

Manifest.Name: Challenge Mode
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds randomly selected challege modifiers to Godhome with several customization options. See ReadMe for info on modifiers and more.

Manifest.Name: DamageValues
Manifest.Description: Shows damage numbers when striking an enemy.

Manifest.Name: FallDamage
Manifest.Description: Player takes fall damage proportional to their max health and time spent falling.

Manifest.Name: ExtraMenuBackgrounds
Manifest.Description: Adds 5 new main menu themes to the Extras menu.

Manifest.Name: HueShifter
Manifest.Description: Uses shaders to change Hallownest's colours. Can also make everything rainbows.

Manifest.Name: CriticalSlash
Manifest.Description: Makes nail arts deal extra damage and return control faster if released at the earliest moment.

Manifest.Name: Mask Maker Notches
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds a few buyable Charm Notches in Mask Maker's room.

Manifest.Name: CelesteKnight
Manifest.Description: Celeste movements like dash, super, hyper, wallbounce

Manifest.Name: Seer
Manifest.Description: Seer Modded Boss

Manifest.Name: AnyZote
Manifest.Description: Most powerful zote modded boss ever.

Manifest.Name: AbsoluteZote
Manifest.Description: A new GPZ mod boss. Install AbsoluteZote and PureZote together to enable AnyZote.

Manifest.Name: Nailgod
Manifest.Description: Sly modded boss.

Manifest.Name: ZoteCollectorHelper
Manifest.Description: Tweaks to Grey Prince Zote and ascended Collector, like the HP of zotelings and more.

Manifest.Name: HitboxOnly
Manifest.Description: Show only hitboxes and hide all sprites. This provides a new experience for several bosses since attack anticipation is no longer visible.

Manifest.Name: PureZote
Manifest.Description: Enabled Grey Prince Zote to summon Eternal Ordeal and upgraded its skills. Install AbsoluteZote and PureZote together to enable AnyZote.

Manifest.Name: SteelSoulHUD
Manifest.Description: Enables the Steel Soul HUD in normal mode.

Manifest.Name: Transcendence
Manifest.Description: Adds 15 new charms with various abilities. Can be used with the randomizer.

Manifest.Name: RainbowEggs
Manifest.Description: A randomizer add-on that makes Rancid Eggs more colorful.

Manifest.Name: RandoZoomZoom
Manifest.Description: A randomizer add-on that makes early movement and geo collection a bit faster.

Manifest.Name: BenchwarpSpoilerCloak
Manifest.Description: A Benchwarp add-on that hides yet-to-be-visited bench names in the menu.

Manifest.Name: QoL
Manifest.Description: A collection of various quality of life improvements.

Manifest.Name: ScreenshotMachine
Manifest.Description: A mod to better create Hollow Knight screenshots.

Manifest.Name: AsciiCamera
Manifest.Description: Applies a shader to the camera which makes the game output as ascii characters.

Manifest.Name: HollowTwitch
Manifest.Description: Allows Twitch Chat to use tons of commands that spice up and vary gameplay.

Manifest.Name: Darkness
Manifest.Description: Makes every room into a dark room (akin to rooms which require lantern without it).

Manifest.Name: God Soul
Manifest.Description: Makes the game really, really hard

Manifest.Name: Random Pantheons
Manifest.Description: Randomizes Godhome’s Pantheons so bosses appear in random order.

Manifest.Name: Mantis Gods
Manifest.Description: Significantly buffs the Mantis Lords fight.

Manifest.Name: Sanic
Manifest.Description: Allows changing the game timescale.

Manifest.Name: ModConsole
Manifest.Description: In-game C# REPL which allows you to easily test code.

Manifest.Name: The Pain of the Path
Manifest.Description: Allows the player to complete the Path of Pain backwards, starting just above the final drop to the Kingsmoulds.

Manifest.Name: Pale Prince
Manifest.Description: Overhaul of the Pure Vessel fight with a significant increase in difficulty

Manifest.Name: Vasi
Manifest.Description: A library with some utility classes.

Manifest.Name: Hell Mod
Manifest.Description: Various nerfs to the player and buffs to the enemies to increase the game difficulty.

Manifest.Name: HowwowKnyight
Manifest.Description: Twanswates aww of de text in Howwow Knyight into de much supewiow UwU wanguage, incwuding menyus, usew intewface and in-game diawogues! OwO

Manifest.Name: Transtrans
Manifest.Description: Tiktiks for trans rights

Manifest.Name: Additional Timelines
Manifest.Description: Adds extra timelines to the stats screen after the end credits.

Manifest.Name: GrassyKnight
Manifest.Description: Tracks and shows you how much grass you've cut.

Manifest.Name: CompassAlwaysOn
Manifest.Description: Makes it so the Knight's icon always appears on the map, even if Wayward Compass isn't in your inventory.

Manifest.Name: GatheringSwarmAlwaysOn
Manifest.Description: Makes it so geo is collected with Gathering Swarm, even if the charm isn't in your inventory.

Manifest.Name: Kronk
Manifest.Description: Simple object counter used for speedruns. Mainly used for Kronk% (all levers).

Manifest.Name: KeybindChaos
Manifest.Description: Randomize the keybinds after a certain (configurable) amount of time has passed.

Manifest.Name: Enemy Randomizer
Manifest.Description: Mod for randomizing the enemies and related things.

Manifest.Name: Menderbug's Revenge
Manifest.Description: Kill the knight whenever you break a background object.

Manifest.Name: Godseeker Memory Jump
Manifest.Description: Face right when dreamnailing the godseeker to warp to the hidden memory, even if you've been there before.

Manifest.Name: BingoUI
Manifest.Description: Automatic tracking of bingo goals for randomizer and speedrun bingo races.

Manifest.Name: EssenceAlways
Manifest.Description: Choose between always or never dropping an essence when killing an enemy (if you have dream nail).

Manifest.Name: Invincibility Monitor
Manifest.Description: Grants invincibility in some scenarios.

Manifest.Name: MylaFlower
Manifest.Description: Protect Myla from the infection by bringing her a flower.

Manifest.Name: SkillUpgrades
Manifest.Description: Provides a collection of upgrades and tweaks to the Knight's Skills. Visit the Mod Menu to enable them.

Manifest.Name: CondensedSpoilerLogger
Manifest.Description: Creates a Condensed Spoiler Log (and several others) in the Rando Logs directory with the key information about the seed.

Manifest.Name: SkiploverSpoilerLog
Manifest.Description: Creates a Skiplover Spoiler Log in the Rando Logs directory showing what would be reachable with All skips enabled.

Manifest.Name: DapperMapperSpoils
Manifest.Description: Adds a category to the condensed spoiler log which shows the locations of the 13 maps.

Manifest.Name: NotSpikesmas
Manifest.Description: Adds an item to the randomization pool that protects against damage from spikes.

Manifest.Name: RandoPlus
Manifest.Description: Add-on for Randomizer 4 that adds more Randomization options; for example, randomize Mr Mushroom locations.

Manifest.Name: FountainPreview
Manifest.Description: Add-on for ItemChanger that makes the basin fountain show the item it's going to give.

Manifest.Name: Randomizable Levers
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 addon that adds the option to randomize levers. Activate lever rando in the Connections menu of Randomizer 4.

Manifest.Name: Rope Rando
Manifest.Description: Adds the rope / chandelier in the Watcher Knights boss room to Randomizer 4.

Manifest.Name: TrandoPlus
Manifest.Description: Add-on for Randomizer 4 that adds more options to Transition Rando; for example, randomize only doorway transitions.

Manifest.Name: RecentItemsDisplay
Manifest.Description: Add-on for ItemChanger (and Rando) which displays recently obtained pickups in the top-right of the screen.

Manifest.Name: RandomizerSettingsRandomizer
Manifest.Description: Add-on for Randomizer 4 that allows you to randomize settings. See the README for info on how to select settings to randomize.

Manifest.Name: Scatternest
Manifest.Description: Addon for Randomizer and ItemSync allowing players to start at multiple different locations.

Manifest.Name: ContainerConfig
Manifest.Description: Addon for ItemChanger to control how certain checks are presented.

Manifest.Name: ReopenCityDoor
Manifest.Description: Opens the locked door between Fungal Wastes and City (above Elder Hu's grave / near the elevator to Crossroads).

Manifest.Name: FStats
Manifest.Description: Displays some stats about a run after the credits screen.

Manifest.Name: InfoPanelUtil
Manifest.Description: Utils for creating info panels through DebugMod.

Manifest.Name: PlayerDataManager
Manifest.Description: Override player data values (for example, always set `hasQuill` to false). Having DebugMod is helpful, but not required.

Manifest.Name: Benchwarp
Manifest.Description: Mod for selecting and warping to benches. Also allows placing benches and warping to room transitions.

Manifest.Name: Randomizer 4
Manifest.Description: Mod for randomizing items and/or transitions, with numerous customization options.

Manifest.Name: ItemChanger
Manifest.Description: Mod which handles editing items and locations for other mods.

Manifest.Name: MenuChanger
Manifest.Description: Mod which handles editing the main menu for other mods.

Manifest.Name: RandomizerCore
Manifest.Description: A library for randomizer logic and algorithms.

Manifest.Name: RandomizerCore.Json
Manifest.Description: A library which adds support for json-encoded logic data to RandomizerCore.

Manifest.Name: ItemChangerDataLoader
Manifest.Description: Mod for creating backups of randomizer saves and launching plandos.

Manifest.Name: ICExtraDeployers
Manifest.Description: ItemChanger add-on which preloads more objects. Use as a dependency for IC files which place custom Baldurs, gates, and more.

Manifest.Name: CustomPoolInjector
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer 4 add-on for providing user-defined item pools for randomizing different item combinations.

Manifest.Name: CustomLogicInjector
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer 4 add-on for providing user-defined logic edits.

Manifest.Name: CustomGroupInjector
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer 4 add-on for providing user-defined item groups for different split group randomizer options.

Manifest.Name: CustomConstraintInjector
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer 4 add-on for providing user-defined constraints on placements and for editing priority weights for items and locations.

Manifest.Name: BenchRando
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer 4 add-on for randomizing benches to new locations and randomizing the ability to warp to benches as items.

Manifest.Name: ItemSync
Manifest.Description: A RandomizerMod 4 add-on for sharing item pickups between players. The default IP no longer works. Please use `mw.hkmp.org` if you want to connect to the public server.

Manifest.Name: MultiWorld
Manifest.Description: A RandomizerMod 4 add-on for distributing players' items between all their worlds. The default IP no longer works. Please use `mw.hkmp.org` if you want to connect to the public server.

Manifest.Name: MultiWorldLib
Manifest.Description: A library for ItemSync and MultiWorld network transmission.

Manifest.Name: PaletteSwapper
Manifest.Description: Mod which changes room color tint.

Manifest.Name: InfiniteNotches
Manifest.Description: Togglable mod for enabling infinite charm notches.

Manifest.Name: EasyMode
Manifest.Description: Togglable mod for making the game slightly easier.

Manifest.Name: LoadNormalizer
Manifest.Description: Mod which extends loads to a user-defined cap, to synchronize loading for races.

Manifest.Name: AdditionalMaps
Manifest.Description: Adds white palace and godhome maps. The white palace one is next to the bench in the big room. The godhome one is next to the bench above the pantheons.

Manifest.Name: BenchWarpFix
Manifest.Description: When benchwarping into a scene without a bench, instead of softlock drops you into dirtmouth. Probably doesn't work with glitched runs.

Manifest.Name: BlindRadiance
Manifest.Description: Makes background darker in selected scenes to make foreground objects more visible.

Manifest.Name: CursedMod
Manifest.Description: This mod does miscellaneous stuff. Like making the game window be dark mode on windows.

Manifest.Name: CustomBgm
Manifest.Description: Allows customization of background music. See its readme for a how-to.

Manifest.Name: CustomSaveArt
Manifest.Description: Makes white palace save art funny. Literally nothing else.

Manifest.Name: EnemyChanger
Manifest.Description: Allows to dump and replace enemy textures. Refer to the readme on how to do that.

Manifest.Name: FireIsSmolBrain
Manifest.Description: Adds a soul totem to dirtmouth and blocks off boss arenas.

Manifest.Name: FullSpeedAhead
Manifest.Description: Removes Parry Slow-Down.

Manifest.Name: FuryFix
Manifest.Description: Tries to fix fury for 1 max health saves.

Manifest.Name: GeoLog
Manifest.Description:
Logs all geo locations in the game.
Takes hours to load into the game.

Manifest.Name: Graphic Options
Manifest.Description: Adds a "few" graphics options. Some of those "might" be unstable to change.

Manifest.Name: HKHKHKHKHK
Manifest.Description: VVVVVVV but in HK. Flip gravity with the R key.

Manifest.Name: Hollow Knight Achievement Manager
Manifest.Description: Allows to manage Hollow Knight achievements, both vanilla and modded. Also syncs them with the online store of choice (GOG, Steam, XBox). Also allows to un-/lock menu themes and game modes.

Manifest.Name: LanguageSupport
Manifest.Description: Allows additional languages to be supported. Doesn't allow for some characters of other languages yet.

Manifest.Name: MenuThemesInGame
Manifest.Description: Applies the menu color correction to gameplay. Breaks immersion.

Manifest.Name: MoreHealing
Manifest.Description: Adds more healing charms.

Manifest.Name: NailsmithBackPay
Manifest.Description: Get your geo back from the nailsmith after upgrading your nail.

Manifest.Name: NeverMuffle
Manifest.Description: Removes the muffling sound effect when taking damage.

Manifest.Name: Zaliants Surprise
Manifest.Description:
This is a mod idea by Zaliant.
Former Description:
This is the Pale Court mod.
Enjoy!

Manifest.Name: Peaking Peeking Peaks
Manifest.Description: This mods aims to make the Crystal Peak name more memorable.

Manifest.Name: PvP Arena
Manifest.Description: This mod adds a PvP arena with an invisible entrance right of the bench in Dirtmouth.

Manifest.Name: RadiantMenu
Manifest.Description: Adds a radiant menu theme to the game.

Manifest.Name: RedoBirthplace
Manifest.Description: Redo the Birthplace cutscene.

Manifest.Name: ResetCharmNotches
Manifest.Description: Reset charm notches and charm notch cost.

Manifest.Name: SFCore
Manifest.Description: Library mod used by other mods.

Manifest.Name: ShowFPS
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds a FPS display in the bottom right corner.

Manifest.Name: SpriteDumper
Manifest.Description: A mod that dumps sprites. Can take more than 10 minutes per dump. Uses the P key to initiate dumping.

Manifest.Name: Stories of a HK player - Chapter 1
Manifest.Description: The start of a story of a Hollow Knight player and his personalized copy of the game.

Manifest.Name: Stories of a HK player - Chapter 2
Manifest.Description:
The second iteration of a story of a Hollow Knight player and his personalized copy of the game.
Warning for people streaming this mod: This mod displays your windows/mac/linux username.

Manifest.Name: Test of Teamwork
Manifest.Description:
Adds a Path of Pain style section to the White Palace.
Start by talking to people in and around dirtmouth.
This is a singleplayer mod. The "teamwork" refers to in-game events.

Manifest.Name: WideCamera
Manifest.Description: Make ultrawide screens possible without black bars. Should also work for thinner/taller than 16:9. In theory.

Manifest.Name: RandomGravityChange
Manifest.Description: A mod that randomly changes gravity periodically or on key press.

Manifest.Name: RandomTeleport
Manifest.Description: A mod that randomly teleports you to another scene periodically, on key press or on damage.

Manifest.Name: DebugMod
Manifest.Description: Allows for debug tools and features like no clip, invincibility, removing and giving items and abilities.

Manifest.Name: SpeedRunQoL
Manifest.Description: A debug Add On that adds new keybinds that are QoL for speedrunning practice. Currently adds Position Save States, Glitched Binds, Force Extra Uumuu attack and radiance quick reload

Manifest.Name: MoreSaves
Manifest.Description: Allows for infinite saves. Uses modmenu to provide other features such as backup/restore, rename, lock and edit values in saves. Note: Editing the current save you are in now takes effect in game

Manifest.Name: Gorb Plus
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds an additional attack when fighting gorb: a nail barrage.

Manifest.Name: HKMP HealthDisplay
Manifest.Description: An addon for HKMP that uses HkmpPouch. Works on the public server.Displays the amount of health other players have

Manifest.Name: Gravity Mod
Manifest.Description: Adds gravity to all objects

Manifest.Name: GlassSoul
Manifest.Description: Makes you die in one hit. Also adds option in modmenu to increases damage dealt by 1 for each extra health

Manifest.Name: Toggle Rando Split Options
Manifest.Description: An extension to the mod Toggleable bindings. It adds split claw, split cloak and cursed nail to the binding list.

Manifest.Name: Hide Mod List
Manifest.Description: Allows you to hide your mod list or reduce the space the mod list takes on the screen.

Manifest.Name: Additional Challenge
Manifest.Description: A mod that allows you to use 46 different effects to make your game more challenging. There are 4 types of effects (Persistent, Cooldown, Boss Attack, Enemy Follow) that can be enabled from modmenu. There is also a choas mode that randomly selects effects to happen periodically.

Manifest.Name: Poorly Translated
Manifest.Description: Poorly Translated Hollow Knight. All text in the game is run through a chain of google translates. Available in English, German, Spanish, French, Italian and Chinese. Note: the English translations were revamped from the 1.4 version to be translated even more poorly

Manifest.Name: HKMirror
Manifest.Description: A core mod that makes it easier to access PlayerData, use reflection, and on/il hooks.

Manifest.Name: ControllerFixes
Manifest.Description: Fixes some controller issues and adds related features.

Manifest.Name: NoDying
Manifest.Description: A simple mod that doesn't allow your health to go below 1 health

Manifest.Name: WeaverCore
Manifest.Description: Core mod required for mods built with WeaverCore, such as Inferno King Grimm and Corrupted Kin

Manifest.Name: Inferno King Grimm
Manifest.Description: A mod that significantly buffs Nightmare King Grimm into a multi-phase fight. It also includes a hard mode that can be configured on the main menu

Manifest.Name: Corrupted Kin
Manifest.Description: A mod that significantly changes up the Lost Kin bossfight

Manifest.Name: Crystal Machinist
Manifest.Description: A mod that significantly changes up the Enraged Guardian bossfight

Manifest.Name: More Godhome Space
Manifest.Description: Adds a third floor to the Hall of Gods area so more modded bosses can be added

Manifest.Name: Ancient Aspid
Manifest.Description: A mod for Hollow Knight that adds a brand new, challenging bossfight to Kingdom's Edge

Manifest.Name: HKMP
Manifest.Description: Hollow Knight Multiplayer allows people to host games and let others join them in their adventures.

Manifest.Name: HKMP Prop Hunt
Manifest.Description: An HKMP add-on that adds Prop Hunt to multiplayer games.

Manifest.Name: HKVR
Manifest.Description: Play Hollow Knight in virtual reality.

Manifest.Name: Enemy HP Bar
Manifest.Description: Adds skinnable HP bars to every enemies and bosses in the game.

Manifest.Name: MagicUI
Manifest.Description: A core mod to help other mods build UIs. Does nothing on its own.

Manifest.Name: ConnectionMetadataInjector
Manifest.Description: A core mod to allow randomizer-supplemental mods like RandoStats and MapModS to get custom metadata from connections without requiring hard dependencies.

Manifest.Name: RandoStats
Manifest.Description: A randomizer-supplemental mod that provides detailed check and obtain stats on the completion screen.

Manifest.Name: MajorItemByAreaTracker
Manifest.Description: A randomizer connection that adds a semi-spoiler randomizer game mode with an in-game tracker.

Manifest.Name: RandoChecksCounter
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight mod that provides a live counter of locations checked.

Manifest.Name: TheRealJournalRando
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 addon that adds the option to randomize all other Hunter's Journal entries. Activate in the Connections menu of Randomizer 4.

Manifest.Name: RandoSettingsManager
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight mod that reimplements and extends Randomizer's settings sharing and preset management with rich support for connection mods.

Manifest.Name: ModTerminal
Manifest.Description: Adds an in-game terminal for entering commands and cheats as a DebugMod addon.

Manifest.Name: ICDebug
Manifest.Description: A ModTerminal addon which adds commands related to ItemChanger.

Manifest.Name: MoreLocations
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 addon that adds assorted locations to the randomizer. Activate in the Connections menu of Randomizer 4.

Manifest.Name: ICPlandoTools
Manifest.Description: Adds assorted utilities for plando authors.

Manifest.Name: GhostHunter
Manifest.Description: A mod that shows the positions of other player's enemies during multiplay.

Manifest.Name: EmoteWheel
Manifest.Description: A mod that allows using custom emotes (also works during multiplay if the server has HkmpPouch).

Manifest.Name: MultiplayerEvents
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds some Multiplayer interactions.

Manifest.Name: HkmpPouch
Manifest.Description: A dependency mod for optional hkmp addons with networking.

Manifest.Name: Satchel
Manifest.Description: A Satchel is a bag, this one has cool stuff for other mods to use.

Manifest.Name: Custom Knight
Manifest.Description: Supports Skins for Player, Enemies and Area overhauls

Manifest.Name: Asymmetric Knight
Manifest.Description: A Custom Knight Addon that allows left and right looking knight sprites to be different.Add a Knight_left.png, Sprint_left.png and Unn_left.png to use.

Manifest.Name: RandomCompanions
Manifest.Description: A Custom Knight Addon that allows hatchlings and weaverlings to use all available skins

Manifest.Name: SmolKnight
Manifest.Description: Allows changing size of the knight

Manifest.Name: SmashKnight
Manifest.Description: Changes Knight handling based on health remaining.

Manifest.Name: ESoulLink
Manifest.Description: A Pouch Mod that makes enemies share health over HKMP server.

Manifest.Name: ModScript
Manifest.Description: Allows writing scripts in JavaScript to mod the game.

Manifest.Name: HKmote
Manifest.Description: Use emotes during multiplayer

Manifest.Name: Hat
Manifest.Description: Wear Hats

Manifest.Name: Memesong
Manifest.Description: Play some meme audio clips as you play (can add or remove clips to make stream friendly)

Manifest.Name: GrubTrain
Manifest.Description: Grubs as Companions

Manifest.Name: Konpanion
Manifest.Description: A tiny knight companion

Manifest.Name: Glass Cannon Mod
Manifest.Description: Makes everything one shot, including you

Manifest.Name: FrogCore
Manifest.Description: Library mod containing helpers for adding journal entries, npcs, shops and many tk2d helpers for editing and creating sprite collections and animations.

Manifest.Name: CustomKnightSuperAnimationAddon
Manifest.Description: Allows inserting custom spritesheets for animations. To export spritesheets, use https://github.com/RedFrog6002/sseadv

Manifest.Name: Unity Explorer
Manifest.Description: Useful tool for mod developers to view and edit how the game is structured.

Manifest.Name: Fast Travel
Manifest.Description: Travel anywhere within Hallownest by clicking on the map.

Manifest.Name: Game Object Dump
Manifest.Description: Allows extraction of atlases, sprites, and audio clips from game objects in the scene.

Manifest.Name: Gatling Aspid
Manifest.Description: Makes primal aspids wield gatling miniguns; configuration options available.

Manifest.Name: Aspid Queen
Manifest.Description: Adds a primal aspid boss fight to the Hall of Gods.

Manifest.Name: SkipToRadiance
Manifest.Description: Makes HK instantly go to phase 4 after dying to The Radiance. Useful for practicing modded Radiance or just if you're too slack to fight HK over and over.

Manifest.Name: Toggleable Bindings
Manifest.Description: Adds the ability to activate/deactivate individual Godhome bindings at any time and lets other developers create custom bindings easier.

Manifest.Name: HollowPoint
Manifest.Description: Gives the player a gun, reworks charms and abilities to play around the concept of gun usage

Manifest.Name: Golden Godhome
Manifest.Description: Reskins bosses in the Godhome to have more golden designs and details

Manifest.Name: Hall of Gods Extras
Manifest.Description: Adds The Hollow Knight and The Radiance to the Hall of Gods.

Manifest.Name: Custom Trial
Manifest.Description: Allows creation of custom trials for the Colosseum of Fools.

Manifest.Name: SilkSong (but not really)
Manifest.Description: Allows the player to play as hornet.

Manifest.Name: Discord Rich Presence
Manifest.Description: Formerly known as "HollowKnightDRPC", this mod adds detailed game status to your Discord profile (when clicked on the username).

Manifest.Name: Aspidnest
Manifest.Description: Adds many unkillable enemies such as Primal Aspids, Crystal Hunters, Loodles, Mantis Petras, Hive Soldiers, Hive Guardians, Squits, Mossflies, Flukefeys and Lance Sentries that follow you in the entirety of Hallownest. This mod is configurable to your own liking in the options page of this mod.

Manifest.Name: Osmi
Manifest.Description: A library mod providing utilities for other mods

Manifest.Name: GodSeekerPlus
Manifest.Description: Various tweaks and utilities to enhance your Godhome experience

Manifest.Name: CompanionCloth
Manifest.Description: Let Cloth accompany and fight with you all the way

Manifest.Name: HealthShare
Manifest.Description: Let some bosses use shared health, API part has moved to Osmi

Manifest.Name: Everwatchers
Manifest.Description: A mod boss based on Watcher Knights, allowing you to fight all of them simutanuously and add more of them

Manifest.Name: TribeOfBattle
Manifest.Description: A boss based on Sisters of Battle and Traitor Lord

Manifest.Name: Crystalblobbles
Manifest.Description: A boss based on Oblobbles

Manifest.Name: ContinueCountdown
Manifest.Description: Adds a countdown upon continuing

Manifest.Name: CharmPreset
Manifest.Description: A mod that allows saving and loading charm presets

Manifest.Name: DoubleJumpFix
Manifest.Description: A mod to fix the notorious bug that the double jump is sometimes not properly canceled

Manifest.Name: No Particles
Manifest.Description: Disables most of the particle effects.

Manifest.Name: AlreadyEnoughPlayMaker
Manifest.Description: A optimization mod for PlayMaker FSMs.

Manifest.Name: WebPCodec
Manifest.Description: WebP codec support for Texture2D

Manifest.Name: FLACCodec
Manifest.Description: FLAC codec support for AudioClip

Manifest.Name: Vanilla Map Mod
Manifest.Description: Adds all items/locations to the existing map.

Manifest.Name: GeoHunger
Manifest.Description: You gradually lose geo and gradually lose health at 0 geo.

Manifest.Name: Pantheons Hit Counter
Manifest.Description: Counts hits in pantheons automatically.

Manifest.Name: Hit Counter
Manifest.Description: Allow creating custom counters for counting hits.

Manifest.Name: DoubleRadiance
Manifest.Description: You can battle with two radiance at same time ,their hp is shared.

Manifest.Name: CustomImage
Manifest.Description: You can change some sprites.

Manifest.Name: ThecurseofSly
Manifest.Description: When you get geo,you will get damage or die.

Manifest.Name: FuryMod
Manifest.Description: A mod if you equipped Fury of Fallen,you will be 1 health and can use it

Manifest.Name: ReverseKnight
Manifest.Description: The knight... look a little strange...

Manifest.Name: Fragile Purse
Manifest.Description: Makes you drop geo whenever you get hit, and has a setting to kill you if you get hit without any geo

Manifest.Name: DeathCounter
Manifest.Description: A cool DeathCounter

Manifest.Name: DecorationMaster
Manifest.Description: A mod for making area harder by adding spike and saw

Manifest.Name: HKTracker
Manifest.Description: Tracks player data. Most frequently used to display abilities/charms during streams

Manifest.Name: FragileStrengthForNailArts
Manifest.Description: Allows Fragile / Unbreakable Strength to increase Nail Art damage. Originally by TTacco

Manifest.Name: ParryKnight
Manifest.Description: Enemies who can be parried only take damage from parries. Only spells can damage other enemies.

Manifest.Name: PaperKnight
Manifest.Description: Sprites are animated with a paper-spinning effect when objects turn.

Manifest.Name: Abskoth
Manifest.Description: A gameplay mod that adds invincible Markoths to the Absolute Radiance fight.

Manifest.Name: QuirrelBoat
Manifest.Description: A mod which makes Quirrel interactable after the events at Blue Lake.

Manifest.Name: BingoBoard
Manifest.Description: In-game bingo board display.

Manifest.Name: HKTool Legacy
Manifest.Description: A library mod.No longer maintained!!!**If it crashes your game, this is normal and the reason is unknown**

Manifest.Name: HKTool
Manifest.Description: A library mod. (Linux not supported)
Manifest.#comment: file version is 2.2.0.0, but published as version 2.2.1.0

Manifest.Name: ShieldParry
Manifest.Description: Allows player to use shield in the game

Manifest.Name: Backdash
Manifest.Description: Allows player to use back dash in the game

Manifest.Name: ChangeHud
Manifest.Description: A mod let you can use different kinds of huds in same mode.

Manifest.Name: QuirrelFlower
Manifest.Description: A little gift for qurriel

Manifest.Name: UnityExplorerPlus
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds functionality to UnityExplorer

Manifest.Name: Dead Cells Barrel Launcher
Manifest.Description: Change the knight's weapon to Barrel Launcher

Manifest.Name: HKTimer
Manifest.Description: An in game timer mod for 1.5

Manifest.Name: SeedSummon
Manifest.Description: A mod you can summon lifeseed!

Manifest.Name: Negative Nail
Manifest.Description: Makes your nail do negative damage forcing you to rely on spells. Recommended you play with Enemy HP Bar mod.

Manifest.Name: DumbEnemy
Manifest.Description: Make Enemy and their attack invisible

Manifest.Name: CountDownForLife
Manifest.Description: When CountDown went to zero,you will be punished

Manifest.Name: CustomJournal
Manifest.Description: A CK addon mod to custom journal image

Manifest.Name: Dead Cells The Queen
Manifest.Description: The mod has been abandoned and is no longer maintained, please use 'Dead Cells Bosses'

Manifest.Name: Dead Cells Bosses
Manifest.Description: Add Dead Cells' Bosses to Hollow Knight
Manifest.#comment: Only got version 1.1.0.0 so far, not 1.1.0.2

Manifest.Name: Dead Cells Time Keeper
Manifest.Description: Add TimeKeeper statue

Manifest.Name: ShadeControl
Manifest.Description: A DebugAddition make you can control shade spell

Manifest.Name: CustomAudio
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight mod can replace some kind of audio

Manifest.Name: Zote Killer
Manifest.Description: Allows you to kill the Zote in the Colosseum

Manifest.Name: Cyclone Throws
Manifest.Description: Allows you to throw the Cyclone as a ranged weapon

Manifest.Name: Mirrored Hallownest
Manifest.Description: Mirrors the entire Hollow Knight map

Manifest.Name: Archipelago
Manifest.Description: Enables play with the Archipelago multiworld system.

Manifest.Name: Archipelago Map Mod
Manifest.Description: A conversion of RandoMapMod that works with the Archipelago multiworld randomizer

Manifest.Name: GreatChampion
Manifest.Description: A Modboss for failed champion

Manifest.Name: Cyclone Real Combat
Manifest.Description: Removed the learn Cyclone cutscene in and replaced it with real combat

Manifest.Name: OrbTracker
Manifest.Description: Points an arrow to the closest Whispering Root orb, and counts how many you have gotten.

Manifest.Name: CustomPantheon
Manifest.Description: A mod add an extra boss door in God Home,BossSequence decided by yourself .

Manifest.Name: HKMP.ModDiff
Manifest.Description: HKMP Addon for checking mod lists between Clients and Servers.

Manifest.Name: HKMP.CheckSave
Manifest.Description: HKMP Addon for checking player save

Manifest.Name: RandomCharm
Manifest.Description: A HollowKnight mod change charm you equipped each scene in random(include Transcendence new charms)

Manifest.Name: Uumuu Plus
Manifest.Description: Uumuu has been slightly enhanced

Manifest.Name: press g to dab
Manifest.Description: press g and the knight will dab

Manifest.Name: Input Buffers
Manifest.Description: Allows for buffering inputs for every knight action.

Manifest.Name: PathOfPureVessel
Manifest.Description: Battle with PV at the end of POP

Manifest.Name: Fennel
Manifest.Description: Ports the Fennel fight from Momodora Reverie Under the Moonlight into Hollow Knight

Manifest.Name: Propeller Knight
Manifest.Description: Adds Propeller Knight from Shovel Knight to Hollow Knight.

Manifest.Name: Cagney Carnation
Manifest.Description: Hollow Knight mod that adds Cagney Carnation boss from Cuphead.

Manifest.Name: Fake Peppino
Manifest.Description: Adds Fake Peppino boss from Pizza Tower.

Manifest.Name: Any Radiance 3.0
Manifest.Description: Any Radiance 3.0

Manifest.Name: Rando Vanilla Tracker
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 add-on for tracking non-randomized items.

Manifest.Name: HKMP Tag
Manifest.Description: An HKMP addon that adds the tag game-mode.

Manifest.Name: The Glimmering Realm
Manifest.Description: Adds a game mode that changes the layout, items and lore of Hallownest into a whole new world to explore - the Glimmering Realm! Join the Discord at https://discord.gg/wP2FFY6uAB

Manifest.Name: Convenient Path of Pain
Manifest.Description: This mod makes it so whenever you strike a Path of Pain Soul Totem or a Wingsmould with your nail it will fully refill your Soul Vessel. Currently this does not work with Nail Arts. Thank you to SFGrenade for making this compatible with non vanilla Totems and Wingsmoulds

Manifest.Name: Godhome Win Loss Tracker
Manifest.Description: Tracks win/loss and hit stats in Hall of Gods and Pantheons.

Manifest.Name: Empty Menu
Manifest.Description: Adds an empty menu screen.

Manifest.Name: Brothers of Battle
Manifest.Description: fight the brothers who where trained by the great nailsage sly

Manifest.Name: Lore Master
Manifest.Description: Adds abilities to lore tablets and certain npc. Currently not usable with Randomizer 4!

Manifest.Name: Bomber Knight
Manifest.Description: Adds a bomb ability, along a few new charms and custom "bosses".

Manifest.Name: KorzUtils
Manifest.Description: Library mod that provide useful functions for other mods.

Manifest.Name: LoreCore
Manifest.Description: Adds a bunch of lore related Item Changer locations and items.

Manifest.Name: Lore Randomizer
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 connection that adds a bunch of lore related items and locations.

Manifest.Name: Extra Rando
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 connection with miscellaneous settings.

Manifest.Name: Arcade Knight
Manifest.Description: Adds some minigames.

Manifest.Name: TheHuntIsOn
Manifest.Description: A mod for manhunting. Provides modules to change how the game affects hunter and speedrunner.

Manifest.Name: Infection Bomb
Manifest.Description: Spawns radiance whenever you kill an infected(or any) bug

Manifest.Name: DarknessRandomizer
Manifest.Description: A Rando 4 connection to randomize the dark corners of Hallownest.

Manifest.Name: MoreDoors
Manifest.Description: A Rando 4 connection which adds more locked doors to Hallownest.

Manifest.Name: TreasureHunt
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer 4 connection fro a semi-spoiler format.

Manifest.Name: UnRando
Manifest.Description: A Rando 4 connection which fixes the order in which rando items are obtained.

Manifest.Name: PurenailCore
Manifest.Description: Common utilities and interop for Purenail mods

Manifest.Name: Scattered and Lost
Manifest.Description: Celeste-themed content mod, expanding Bretta's hut

Manifest.Name: SpicyRando
Manifest.Description: Various difficulty increases in specific parts of rando

Manifest.Name: Sein
Manifest.Description: Companion mod for the Custom Knight skin "Ori", adding specialized effects

Manifest.Name: SpoilerViewerMod
Manifest.Description: Provides a Java GUI for navigating the spoiler log of randos or plandos. Requires Java to be installed.

Manifest.Name: MapChanger
Manifest.Description: A library for map mods.

Manifest.Name: RandoMapMod
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer 4 overhaul of the World Map to help find item and transition checks.

Manifest.Name: Twister Indicator
Manifest.Description: Adds a gray tint (can be customised) to your soul bar when you can use spells with the Spell Twister charm

Manifest.Name: Carefree Grimm
Manifest.Description: Allows you to have Carefree Melody and Grimmchild at the same time

Manifest.Name: Sit Button
Manifest.Description: Makes it possible to sit anywhere with a button press

Manifest.Name: CustomKnightPlus
Manifest.Description: A mod that provides conditional skin support for Custom Knight

Manifest.Name: NoSpiders
Manifest.Description: A mod to remove the spiders in the foreground of deepnest

Manifest.Name: Curse Randomizer
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 connection that adds additional cursed options.

Manifest.Name: NoWalkOfShame
Manifest.Description: Respawns you in the room you died in (skipping darkrooms/dreamrooms/colosseum)

Manifest.Name: Always Furious
Manifest.Description: Fury of the Fallen is always active while equipped

Manifest.Name: Charm Overhaul
Manifest.Description: Port of Charm Overhaul to 1.5. Rebalances and reworks various Charms and adds new synergies

Manifest.Name: Charm Changer
Manifest.Description: Lets you customize the strength of some Charm effects

Manifest.Name: Disable Enemy Geo
Manifest.Description: Enemies no longer drop Geo

Manifest.Name: Dream Warpers
Manifest.Description: Gorb, Elder Hu, and No Eyes teleport 100% of the time after being damaged.

Manifest.Name: GPZ Precepts
Manifest.Description: GPZ displays a random precept each time he takes damage. He is invulnerable while it is displayed

Manifest.Name: Grimmchild Anywhere
Manifest.Description: Grimmchild can spawn during TMG and NKG fights

Manifest.Name: Infinite AbsRad Phases
Manifest.Description: Makes the selected AbsRad phase infinite

Manifest.Name: Menderbug Options
Manifest.Description: Choose Menderbug's spawn chance, whether he respawns after dying, and whether the sign must be broken

Manifest.Name: Nailmaster's Pride
Manifest.Description: Nailmaster's Glory prevents regular Nail attacks but grants all Nail Arts and automatically charges them

Manifest.Name: Crafted Town
Manifest.Description: The Crafted Town adds a new location, several spell alternatives and some charm upgrades (on alpha as of now).

Manifest.Name: Upgraded DreamShield
Manifest.Description: Turns the Dream Shield into a bow of sorts that can block lasers.

Manifest.Name: DreamShield Coop
Manifest.Description: Mod that allows coop with a 2nd or 3rd player as a dreamshield or grimmchild clone. Support for other mods to easily add more.

Manifest.Name: Boss Attacks
Manifest.Description: Train boss fights in Hall of Gods against specific boss attacks and more.

Manifest.Name: Pet
Manifest.Description: Gives pets that follow the hero.

Manifest.Name: RCPathfinder
Manifest.Description: A pathfinder library for RandomizerCore.

Manifest.Name: SlantedKnight
Manifest.Description: The knight is slanted depending on its HP.

Manifest.Name: AspyCompanion
Manifest.Description: Replaces Grimmchild with Aspy.

Manifest.Name: Soul Nail on Heavy Blow
Manifest.Description: With Heavy Blow on every 5 hits you create a sibling that sharp shadows a nearby enemy.

Manifest.Name: HKRoomLogger
Manifest.Description: Logs scene transitions to a file. Companion mod to Windows-only software HKAT.

Manifest.Name: Text Randomizer
Manifest.Description: Shuffles around all text in Hollow Knight

Manifest.Name: Disable Achievements
Manifest.Description: Prevents the game from awarding achievements, both in-game and on all platforms (Steam, GoG etc.)

Manifest.Name: TheGloryOfBeingAFoolRandomizer
Manifest.Description: Randomizes the glory of being a Fool.

Manifest.Name: Grass Randomizer
Manifest.Description: Randomizer 4 connection that adds grass to the pool of randomized items and locations.

Manifest.Name: GrassCore
Manifest.Description: A core mod for grass-related activities.

Manifest.Name: BingoSync
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight mod that automatically marks squares on bingosync.com

Manifest.Name: Soul Paladin
Manifest.Description: A mod that speeds up the Soul Warrior fight and modifies it's attacks.

Manifest.Name: NoBlur
Manifest.Description: Clean your glasses and see Hollow Knight's background objects without blur. Options for removing Blur planes, Fog objects, and Haze objects.

Manifest.Name: Keep Me Geo
Manifest.Description: Don't want the anxiety of losing everything when you die? Then Keep Me Geo will take your worries away! You won't lose any more geo than you want to when you die!

Manifest.Name: Stop Hitting Yourself
Manifest.Description: The night becomes clumsy

Manifest.Name: ShyKnight
Manifest.Description: Removes the audience from Godhome arenas and Colosseum of Fools

Manifest.Name: EasySoulRefill
Manifest.Description: Instantly refills your soul meter whenever you respawn, sit on a bench or enter a dream boss arena (compatible with Pale Court)

Manifest.Name: LessVisualNoise
Manifest.Description: Reduces amount of visuals in the game for accessibility purposes. Still in development. Recommended to use along with the No Particles mod

Manifest.Name: Legacy Charm Costs
Manifest.Description: A mod that reverts Quick Slash and Flukenest to their older notch costs (2 notches). Offers the option to make the changes persistent on opened saves after being diabled.

Manifest.Name: Static Camera
Manifest.Description: Locks the camera in place with a keybind.

Manifest.Name: Vessel May Cry
Manifest.Description: A mod that overhauls the Knight's moveset to match Vergil's. Reading the mod page is recommended.

Manifest.Name: AbsRad Configurable Attacks
Manifest.Description: Allows configuration of Absolute Radiance's attack frequencies. Works with multiple Radiances at once.

Manifest.Name: AbsRad Teleport Control
Manifest.Description: Allows disabling teleport locations in the platform and final phases of the Absolute Radiance fight. Works with multiple Radiances at once.

Manifest.Name: Radiance Multiplier
Manifest.Description: Allows fighting up to ten Absolute Radiances at once. Uses shared HP.

Manifest.Name: Steady Hands (automap)
Manifest.Description: Steadies the Knight's hands so they can draw while walking (updates map automatically without needing to rest at a bench)

Manifest.Name: Kindred Spirit
Manifest.Description: Replaces the Massive Mosscharger's statue in Godhome with a dream and non dream version of the Greenpath Vessel.

Manifest.Name: Fart Knight
Manifest.Description: Adds fart attack

Manifest.Name: ImmortalLight
Manifest.Description: A modboss for Absolute Radiance

Manifest.Name: LostFocus
Manifest.Description: A mod that automatically pauses and mutes the game when you switch tabs.

Manifest.Name: HKViz
Manifest.Description: A mod that records analytics like movement, deaths, equipped charms, abilities used and much more to allows visualizing those analytics on hkviz.org

Manifest.Name: Nightmare and Void
Manifest.Description: Converts the Nightmare King Grimm fight into a custom duo boss with the Pure Vessel.

Manifest.Name: CarThingMod
Manifest.Description: Throws a car everytime the player swings their nail

Manifest.Name: Deez Nuts Mod
Manifest.Description: Replaces all text with Deez Nuts

Manifest.Name: HallOfGodsRandomizer
Manifest.Description: DEPRECATED. USE GODHOME RANDOMIZER INSTEAD - A randomizer add-on for Hall of Gods bosses.

Manifest.Name: CombatRandomizer
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer add-on for a cursed combat experience.

Manifest.Name: FlowerRandomizer
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight Randomizer add-on for flower quest lovers.

Manifest.Name: GodhomeRandomizer
Manifest.Description: A Randomizer add-on for Godhome elements.

Manifest.Name: CelesteDash
Manifest.Description: Bring a Celeste-like dash system into Hollow Knight

Manifest.Name: RecentItemsDisplayNoGrass
Manifest.Description: RecentItemsDisplay GrassRando notDisplay Grass

Manifest.Name: LockResolution
Manifest.Description: Lock Resolution On GamePlay. VSync On LostFocus

Manifest.Name: MapSyncMod
Manifest.Description: Sync Map Bench battle boss lever wall Floor door and other on ItemSyncMOD

Manifest.Name: BenchDeploy
Manifest.Description: Deploy Multi Bench use controller/keyboard. other player bench on itemsync MapSyncMod

Manifest.Name: MetalPipeHM
Manifest.Description: A hollow knight mod that plays the metal pipe falling sound whenever the knight swings their nail.

Manifest.Name: Soul Sovereign
Manifest.Description: Provides a rework to the Soul Tyrant fight to make it more challenging.

Manifest.Name: LessHealing
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight mod that adds toggleable options that remove various healing methods from the game.

Manifest.Name: AccessRandomizer
Manifest.Description: A randomizer add-on for miscellaneous access checks.

Manifest.Name: Moonside
Manifest.Description: Yes is No and No is Yes. It makes perfect sense in Moonside.

Manifest.Name: UnrestrictedSteelSoul
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight mod that enables permadeath in dream/godhome zones when playing in steel soul mode.

Manifest.Name: BossSync
Manifest.Description: This mod is now obsolete as its features are implemented into another mod (MapSyncMod). Currently working on another mod to polish up some things for 112% Coop APB speedruns that will be released under the name "SpeedrunSync"

Manifest.Name: Afterimage Plus
Manifest.Description: A mod that gives customizable afterimages to the Knight and enemies.

Manifest.Name: RemoveLaggyObjects
Manifest.Description: Removes various objects from scenes where they can cause major lag.

Manifest.Name: Biblically Accurate Lasers
Manifest.Description: Adds some configurable lasers to the Radiance and Absolute Radiance fights.

Manifest.Name: CollectorGlitchRemover
Manifest.Description: Prevents the "insta-grab" and "sticky feet" Collector glitches.

Manifest.Name: Casino Knight
Manifest.Description: Lets go gambling! Adds a casino with slot machines into Dirtmouth to spend geo on. Win big!

Manifest.Name: Rogue
Manifest.Description: A rogue-like Pantheon of Hallownest mod

Manifest.Name: SpellChanger
Manifest.Description: A library mod that aims to allow other mods to edit spells and nail arts more easily.

Manifest.Name: ExtraSpells
Manifest.Description: A mod that adds a handful of new spells (and 1-ish nail art). Cycle by selecting the spell in the inventory.

Manifest.Name: Charm Changer Rando
Manifest.Description: A mod to randomize the settings of Charm Changer

Manifest.Name: QuickDive
Manifest.Description: A mod that remaps your Quick Cast button to only Dive

Manifest.Name: Godhome Elo Counter
Manifest.Description: A mod that introduces an ELO rating system to Godhome

Manifest.Name: Christmas In Dirtmouth
Manifest.Description: Things are getting festive in Dirtmouth! This mod adds a new Christmas decoration shop in Dirtmouth owned by a new NPC, Merrywisp. Happy holidays!

Manifest.Name: Hivesong
Manifest.Description: This mod adds a new charm, Hivesong, which increases the damage dealt by pets.

Manifest.Name: CharmPatch
Manifest.Description: This is a collection of small changes that I think improve the balance of certain charms in the game. This should be fully compatible with Excempt-Medic's Charm Overhaul mod.

Manifest.Name: ouchyGrass
Manifest.Description: Touching grass hurts or kills the player.

Manifest.Name: AllHallownestEnhanced
Manifest.Description: This is a mod that enhances the entire Hallownest. I spent 2.5 months to make it. It will take you to experience the joy of meeting the Hollow Knight first. I hope it can become a good meal replacement before the release of SilkSong.

Manifest.Name: LumaflyKnight
Manifest.Description: Tracks how many lumaflies you've freed

Manifest.Name: FasterIntroSkip
Manifest.Description: Makes skipping the intro cutscenes faster.
